an3.80:4.2: loke sahassaṃ → tasmiṃ sahassaṃ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.80:7.1: tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ → tisahassiṃ mahāsahassiṃ lokadhātuṃ (sya-all, km); tisahassīmahāsahassī lokadhātuṃ (pts1ed)
an3.80:9.1: āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ → bhagavantaṃ (si ), cck, sya1ed, km potthakesu natthi. aṭṭhakathāya
